name: Test_quotable_api_with_tags_pages_author_queryparams

children.description: Given the api is composed of "https://api.quotable.io/"
Given A call to quotable api with path as "quotes"

Then validate the api with following multiple queryparams
| property | value |
| tags | friendship |
| page | 1 |
| author | Mencius |

reportData.title: Response Body with status code : 200

userStory.narrative: I want to automate the QuotableAPI and validate the various functionalities

title: Test quotable api with tags pages author queryparams

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given A call to quotable api with path as "<path>"
Then validate the api with following multiple queryparams
When response code is "200"
Then validate the total count "<totalCount>"

scenarioOutline:
Given A call to quotable api with path as "<path>"
Then validate the api with following multiple queryparams
|property | value|
|tags | <tagValue>|
|page | <pageValue>|
|author | <authorValue>|
When response code is "200"
Then validate the total count "<totalCount>"
